price: That Day is sure to come. So whoever wills may seek a path leading to his Lord[12].
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
footnotes: [12] i.e., the path of guidance and righteous deeds.
